content.rendered:
22Bet Kenya Review.

When we talk about top betting sites in Kenya, 22bet has to be at the core of that conversation. It is a new betting site that has taken over the Kenyan market by a storm. It is hard to blame Kenyans for opting to go for this betting site, especially given the fact that it has a number of features that make it stand out. We have done a comparative analysis of this betting site with others and narrowed down its user-friendly interface as well as its huge array of betting options and bonuses as the top reasons why it stands out. That being said, we encourage you to click on our special invite link and get to enjoy a deposit bonus of up to Ksh 15,000. 

22Bet at a glance

Odds – 10/10

Bonuses – 9.5/10

Markets Offered – 9/10

Features – 9/10

Summary

22Bet is a betting company whose online platform avails a user=friendly interface that is easy for anyone to use. It also incorporates more than 50 foreign languages which you are free to choose from, depending on your preference. If a betting platform offers really good odds, has a reliable customer support system and has the best bonuses, it goes without say that customers will queue up to join such a platform. 22bet is one of the few betting companies which does this.  The best part is the deposit bonus of Ksh 15,000 which is just waiting for you.

OVERALL

9.3/10

USER REVIEW 4.29 (7 votes)

BET NOW ON 22BET

In-Depth Review

From the way this new betting site is taking over the market, one can argue that the people behind its launch and operation did their homework well enough. It is hard to find this many features in one bet site. The amount of creativity that went into the design of their website is unrivaled in the Kenyan market.  They also boast of a reliable customer support system that works 24vhours a day.

This company is also hailed for being accessible in any country. This means that you can place a bet whether you are in a country like, Japan, Germany or even England with ease. The fact that is has more than 50 foreign languages makes it even more appealing.

Homepage Features

Below are some of the specifications of this betting site that make it stand out:

INSANE Bonuses

Despite having a considerably high number of clients, they still continue to offer numerous unique bonus options. They are well determined to make their presence felt in the Kenyan market.

Theirfirst deposit bonus option is one of the highest in the country whereby, a new customer has the ability to geta cash bonus scaling up to 15,000 KES.

In order to receive this bonus, the procedure is as simple as shown below.

The first step involves clicking our special invite link which will take you to their official website. After creatingan account, you will deposit your stake and choose the games you would like to bet on. We recommend that your first deposit be a big one since te bonus you get is silillar to your deposit.

After this is done, your bonus amount will be duly credited to your account and you will be more than free to use it to place bets as allowed in their terms and conditions. 

FAQs

What you can bet on?

They offer the hugest sports betting options in the entire country. Whatever sport you are thinking of right now, it is definitely there. Some of the sport types they offer include: American Football, Australian Football, Bandy, Basketball, Beach Soccer, Biathlon, Bowling, Boxing, Chess, Cricket, Cross country Skiing, Crossfit, Curling, Cycling, Darts, Entertainment, Entertainment, Figure Skating, Floorball, Football, Formula 1, Futsal, GAA Football, Golf, Greyhounds, Handball, Horse Racing, Ice Hockey, MMA, Martial Arts, MotoGP, Motor Sports, Netball, Olympic Games, Pesapallo, Rugby, Rugby Union, Speedway, Surfing, Swimming, TV, Table Tennis, Tennis, Triathlon, Trotting, Volleyball, Water Polo, Winter Sports, Βaseball.

How do I Deposit?

It is nearly impossible to find a betting site with as many payment options as this one. They Accept both local and international payment options. This means that you are able to make payment with your Safaricom or airtel line and you further have an option of making payments using international money payment options such as credit cards, neteller, skill and via Visa. What’s more fascinating is that they accept cryptocurrencies such as bit coin.

Pros

User=friendly interface.

Numerous withdrawal options.

They have top tier software providers.

24/7 live chat.

27 sports available.

Best live betting.

Multi live streaming.

Free withdrawals.

Available in many countries.

Great mobile app.

Cons

Customer support needs to be improved.

In conclusion, they have a really good website and multiple sports betting options that are quite appealing. Their support system could however be improved.

Learn more about supabet247
